PHRASE.LANG: Joey will keep them company when you're not around. [#Legal]
Joey leur tiendra compagnie quand vous serez absent. [#Legal]
Joey leistet ihnen Gesellschaft, wenn du nicht da bist. [#Legal]
Joey gli farà compagnia quando tu non ci sei. [#Legal]
Joey les hará compañía cuando tú no estés. [#Legal]
여러분이 없을 때는 조이가 그들의 친구가 되어 줄 겁니다. [#Legal]
Joey will keep them company when you're not around. [#Legal]
你不在時就讓Joey給他們作伴吧。 [#Legal]
你不在時就讓Joey給他們作伴吧。 [#Legal]
Joey will keep them company when you're not around. [#Legal]
